resources.string:
Use your finger to move Albert up and down. He will chomp mascots automatically when in range.

 CHOMP: Chomps mascots with extended range.

 GROWL: Slows down mascots.

 ALBERTA: Ten chomps with Alberta by your side.

 TEBOW: Blocks ten mascots.

 It's been said Crab Legs will help deter Seminoles.
